item.title: Projects
item.description: Selected Projects Design and Implementation of Environmental Monitoring System Based on IoT Final Project The existing management system for computer labs has insufficient measurement factors. We design a system with the ability of sensing the environment and maintain certain conditions automatically , while the conditions can be controlled remotely. The system includes a sensing device based on STM32, an Android application to monitor and control, and a back-end cloud platform for data processing.
